Halton Arp, Quasars, Redshifts & Controversies, p.179

"... in response to the authority problem presented by many professional scientists who have an awesome amount of scientific knowledge and competence, I can only say this: it may sometimes be that not to know one thing that is wrong could be more important than knowing a hundred things that are right."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Arp on the Immense Danger of Knowledge that is Wrong
